testimonials.author: Eugenia
testimonials.title: Parent
testimonials.text: Kaili is an inspiring tutor for my daughter Chiara. She is always able to provide help and guidance when needed. Chiara has improved her confidence and grades since starting lessons with Kaili.

testimonials.author: Troy
testimonials.title: Parent
testimonials.text: Lotte really struggled grasping and keeping pace with her Maths class, since she started tutoring with Kaili her grades have improved, her confidence has grown and she is fully engaged in her own progression. Kaili's feedback and support for Lotte has been invaluable.

testimonials.author: Jules
testimonials.title: Parent
testimonials.text: Kaili tutors my twins in IB physics and chemistry. She has been very helpful and is very caring. They both feel very comfortable with her and their marks have improved.
